Name: ANIME STANDING
About the game: You are a Delivery Agent. Your goal is to deliver packages save & sound to our bases, taking care of our people's needs. Dont' worry, you'll be awarded accordingly. It's one of a kind journey. Dangerous and lonely. There are: 5 lonely missions to complete gallery of images to unlock world's secrets to explore atmospheric soundtracks
